description.value:
The devil makes two attacks: one with its spear and one with its tail.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 2d8 + @mod type=piercing average=true]] damage plus [[/damage 3d6 type=cold average=true]] damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a [[/save con 15 format=long]], or for 1 minute, its speed is reduced by 10 feet; it can take either an action or a bonus action on each of its turns, not both; and it canâ€™t take reactions. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 2d6 + @mod type=piercing average=true]] damage plus [[/damage 3d6 type=cold average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 2d4 + @mod type=slashing average=true]] damage plus [[/damage 3d6 type=cold average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 2d6 + @mod type=bludgeoning average=true]] damage plus [[/damage 3d6 type=cold average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

The devil magically forms an opaque wall of ice on a solid surface it can see within 60 feet of it. The wall is 1 foot thick and up to 30 feet long and 10 feet high, or it's a hemispherical dome up to 20 feet in diameter.

When the wall appears, each creature in its space is pushed out of it by the shortest route. The creature chooses which side of the wall to end up on, unless the creature is &Reference[incapacitated]{incapacitated}. The creature then makes a [[/save dex 17 format=long]], taking [[/damage 10d6 type=cold average=true]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

The wall lasts for 1 minute or until the devil is &Reference[incapacitated]{incapacitated} or dies. The wall can be damaged and breached; each 10-Â­foot section has AC 5, 30 hit points, vulnerability to &Reference[fire]{fire} damage, and immunity to &Reference[acid]{acid}, &Reference[cold]{cold}, &Reference[necrotic]{necrotic}, &Reference[poison]{poison}, and &Reference[psychic]{psychic} damage. If a section is destroyed, it leaves behind a sheet of frigid air in the space the wall occupied. Whenever a creature finishes moving through the frigid air on a turn, willingly or otherwise, the creature must make a [[/save con 17 format=long]], taking [[/damage 5d6 type=cold average=true]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The frigid air dissipates when the rest of the wall vanishes.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]] and a save is required.

Devil's Sight. Magical darkness doesn't impede the devil's &Reference[darkvision]{darkvision}.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Magic Resistance. The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].
